scripts.docsync: git fetch && git pull && git push
scripts.buildts: yarn workspace @collaborated/common && yarn workspace @collaborated/interact tsc && yarn workspace test-addon tsc && yarn workspace server tsc && yarn workspace app tsc
scripts.buildall: yarn buildts && yarn docs && yarn workspace web snowpack build
scripts.netlifydeploy: yarn && yarn workspace @collaborated/interact tsc && yarn workspace web snowpack build
scripts.docsend: git add docs && git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages && git push
